import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { LOGO } from 'src/app/constants/constants'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.scss'] }) export class HeaderComponent { logo:string =LOGO; }
